org.dataconservancy.dcs.ingest.services

Class BasicFeatureExtraction.Job<Ko,Vo>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dataconservancy.dcs.ingest.services.BasicFeatureExtraction.Job<Ko,Vo>
  • Enclosing class:
    BasicFeatureExtraction

    public static class BasicFeatureExtraction.Job<Ko,Vo>
extends Object
    Transform/extraction job to be run by BasicFeatureExtraction.

    Specifies a single transformation/extraction job, plus allows defining extra context for logging or allowing failures without stopping ingest.

    Configuration

    setMapping(Mapping)
    Required. The Mapping used in this job
    #setOutput(Output)
    Required. The Output used in this job.
    setFailureAllowed(boolean)
    Allows failure of this job without stopping ingest or other extractions. Default is false (i.e. an exception will stop ingest)
    setLabel(String)
    Assign a label/name to this job. Used to assist in logging and reporting.
    setCreateEvent(boolean)
    Determine of the success/failure of transformation job should be logged as a DcsEvent of type Events.TRANSFORM or Events.TRANSFORM_FAIL. Default is false (i.e. no event will be created)
    #setOutcomeListener(OutcomeListener)
    Notify the given BasicFeatureExtraction.OutcomeListener when a job completes normally or abnormally.
